ARABIC: أَوَلَيْسَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلْخَلَّٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Does He who created the heavens and earth not have the power to create the same again? Yes indeed! He is the Creator, the All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: How can He who created the heavens and the earth not be able to create others like them? Why not? He is the real creator all-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Has He Who created the heavens and the earth no power to create the likes of them? Yes, indeed, He is the Superb Creator.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Is the One who has created the heavens and the earth not able to create another creature like the human being? He certainly has the power to do so. He is the Supreme Creator and is All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And is it not possible for the One Who created the heavens and the earth to create the likes of them? It is surely possible, why not? And He is the Great Creator, the All Knowing of everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth, able to create the like of them Yes, indeed! He is the All-Knowing Supreme Creator.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like of them? Yea! and He is the Creator (of all), the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Is not He, who created the heavens and earth, able to create the like of them? Yes indeed; He is the All-creator, the All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth Able to create the like of them? Aye, that He is! for He is the All-Wise Creator,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Is He who created the heavens and earth not able to create others like these people? Of course He is! He is indeed the Supreme Creator, the All Knowing:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like of these? Yea! He is the Supreme Creator, the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like of them? Yes indeed! He is the All-creator, the All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like thereof?" - Yea, indeed! for He is the Creator Supreme, of skill and knowledge (infinite)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Is not He, Who created the heavens and the earth Able to create the like of them? Yes, indeed! He is the All-Knowing Supreme Creator.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Is He who created the heavens and the earth unable to create their like? Yes, indeed, He is the Creator, the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like of them? Certainly. He is the Supreme All-Knowing Creator.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth Able to create the likes of them? Yes, [it is so]; and He is the Knowing Creator.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:81] Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth, in all their immensity, able to create the like of them?, namely, human beings, in all their minuteness? Yes indeed, He is able to do this — God Himself replies here. And He is the Creator (khallāq means Creator of many things), the Knower, of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth Able to create) to revive (the like of them? Aye that He is!) He is Able to do so, (for He is the All-Wise Creator) Who will resurrect the dead,
